IX.iii.1.C.2.
a
.
Impact of a Spouse’s Income on Section 306 Pension
A spouse’s countable income may be a factor in determining the rate payable to a Section 306 Pension beneficiary per
38 CFR 3.262(b)
.
Note
:  A spouse’s income is
not
a factor for purposes of Old-Law Pension.
